name: codelexa
description: Command the Codex automation agent through Amazon Alexa. This package contains the skill manifest and interaction model so it can be versioned, reviewed, and published from source control.

scripts.deploy: skill_id=$(node -e "const fs=require('fs');const data=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./.ask/config','utf-8'));console.log(data.deploy_settings.default.skill_id);") && ask deploy --target skill-metadata && ask smapi update-account-linking-info -s $skill_id -g development --account-linking-request file:skill-package/account-linking.json && pm2 restart codelexa --update-env && pm2 save
